p: Morphological analysis of the films under study was carried out by optical microscopy (20Ã— magnification), to evaluate the homogeneity and the structure of the prepared films. Figure 4 shows the surface micrographs of SA (a), Pe (c) and SA + Pe (e) films and of SA 0.30, Pe 0.30 and SA + Pe 0.30 (respectively (b), (d) and (f)).
